name: Dracula 4: The Shadow of the Dragon
name_original: Dracula 4: The Shadow of the Dragon
description:
Dracula 4: The Shadow of the Dragon is an adventure game developed by Microids and Koalabs. It came out on 19-06-2013. Anuman Interactive published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
You can play Dracula 4: The Shadow of the Dragon on PC.
Franck Berrios produced the game. Pierre Estève scored the game.
